- PMSport gathered at the Force Road Office of the NSC that the Association Chairmen in the States have been mandated to elect their national leader and other members of the boards. - PMSport gathered at the Force Road Office of the NSC that the Association Chairmen in the States have been mandated to elect their national leader and other members of the boards.

Our source at the National Sports Commission disclosed that the states chairmen would be informed as soon as the sole administrator gives the Our source at the National Sports Commission disclosed that the states chairmen would be informed as soon as the sole administrator gives the

go-ahead and that is expected not later than this week. "The Association Chairman in the States will now elect who leads them at the National level. So the success of anynational association chairman will heavily depend on his relationship with the state association chairman". Chief Rhodes' order for election, which received the unwavering sup- port of NSC top officials, has sent Incumbent sports association chair- men lobbying for support. "Some of them have even sent emissaries to the states in order to lobby the chairman for support. And this is expected to continue until the go-ahead and that is expected not later than this week.
